weddings and events

This page contains details of our weddings and other events. They are for members of the Battle Band, or by invitation only (sorry), unless otherwise stated - but feel free to see what we're up to anyway, especially our open days.

Outings
24 August 2002
The outing it to Essex, as organised by Paul Franks. Meeting at Battle church at 7am.
The tower list is as follows:

Times(approx)Dedication, TownNo BellsWeightKey
0900 - 0945St Mary the Virgin, Kelvedon621E
1015 - 1100St Peter ad Vincula, Coggeshall1024.25E
1130 - 1215St Michael the Archangel, Braintree1011.25F#
1245 - 1415PUB LUNCH, The Retreat, Bocking
1415 - 1500St Mary's, Bocking1018.25E
1530 - 1615All Saints, Rayne66.5Bb
1645 - 1730St Mary and St Lawrence, Great Waltham822.5D


Read the write-up, after the event....


Open Days
13 July 2002
Our open day this year is to co-incide with the church's flower festival. We'll be open from 9 'till 5, and the cost is a mere £1.50.

You are welcome to come along to see our bells and views. You will have superb views of the town and surrounding area (on a good day you'll be able to see Beachy Head), a ringing demonstration and a chance to see the bells.
